long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Testing webfonts is tricky business. With the Wavma Font Explorer, you can test any font on any website for free. Use the built-in text editor or upload your SVG from Figma, Illustrator, or Inkscape.
